name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Night Environment: British Isles
description: Night Environment: British Isles for FSX: Steam Edition revolutionizes your British night flying experience. Using a series of databases, this add-on adds appropriate types of lighting to different kinds of roads and other areas.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Cessna C400 Corvalis TT
description: The C400 Corvalis TT has been designed to further push the limits of what can be achieved and delivers super high quality detail to satisfy even the most demanding private pilot’s needs.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Rockwell B-1B Lancer
description: The Rockwell B-1B Lancer, affectionately known as the "Bone" to its crews, is a key element of the American Strategic Long Range bomber fleet. The aircraft, while not technically stealth-capable, is designed to present only a fraction of the radar profile of earlier large bomber types and incorporates extremely advanced...

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Night Environment: France
description: Night Environment completely revolutionizes night flying in the FSX: Steam Edition world. Using a series of databases, Night Environment adds brilliant, realistic lighting to your simulator. Hundreds of thousands of lights clearly show how highways connect to cities and how smaller roads meander through neighborhoods.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Farm Air
description: Are you ready to make high-speed, low-altitude passes over crowded fields? Get ready to give your joystick a death-grip as you make tight turns just below the critical angle of attack. Compete to be the best duster around in Farm Air, the latest from TakeFlight Interactive. Put yourself in the boots of a new crop duster pilot.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - VFR Real Scenery NexGen 3D: Vol.1 - Southern England and South Wales
description: Just Flight's NexGen 3D series of UK photographic scenery combines high resolution photographic textures with accurately placed autogen objects and additional custom scenery objects to give a true '3D' feel to your VFR flights.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Piper PA-28R Arrow III
description: Developed by Just Flight's in-house development team, this highly accurate and immaculately detailed Arrow III package comes in eleven detailed paint schemes with 4096 x 4096 textures and with a truly 3D virtual cockpit featuring fully functional custom-coded avionics, fuel and electrical systems.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - US Cities X: Chicago
description: Welcome to Chicago! US Cities X: Chicago for FSX: Steam Edition brings you the famed Windy City in high detail – it even includes a glimpse of the future as you are able to see the Chicago Spire, a skyscraper currently in development!

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim Scandinavia
description: Toposim Scandinavia for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 11 / 19m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for the Scandinavia region, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile. This terrain pack makes VFR flying in this beautiful region more realistic.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Douglas F4D Skyray
description: When first designed in 1947, the Douglas Skyray was on the cutting edge of aviation technology. In 1948, Douglas Aircraft was contracted to build the F4D-1, with the first flight of a production model taking place in 1954.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Moving Map
description: Take control of your world with Moving Map! Developed by FS-FlightControl, Moving Map gives you a better handle on the big picture: it will follow your aircraft regardless of where it is in the sim, and will provides you with detailed information on airport layouts, navaids, and more.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim US Mountain West
description: Toposim US Mountain West for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 12 / 10m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for this topographically varied region of the United States, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Boeing Vertol CH-46 Sea Knight
description: The Boeing Vertol CH-46 Sea Knight is a medium-lift tandem rotor transport helicopter powered by twin turboshaft aircraft engines.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - US Cities X: Boston
description: US Cities X: Boston from Aerosoft includes more than 4,000 major buildings modelled, 350,000 realistically placed autogen buildings, nine helipads and five major airports including Logan International.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim US Southwest
description: Toposim US Southwest for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 12 / 10m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for the Southwest region of the United States, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - North American AJ-2 Savage
description: The AJ Savage was the first U.S. bomber specifically designed to carry the atomic bomb. It was North American's first attack bomber for the U.S. Navy designed shortly after the end of World War II, and was the largest twin-engine Heavy Attack aircraft on board the carriers of the time.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Cessna C207 Skywagon
description: Alabeo's C207 Skywagon package for FSX brings you the regular and bush variants of the aircraft in five paint schemes - the bush variant liveries really look the part!

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - YMML Melbourne International Airport
description: YMML Melbourne Int’l by Orbx is a highly detailed recreation of this important air hub for FSX: Steam Edition. This is the third version of YMML, which includes the most recent infrastructure changes at Melbourne including the Terminal 4 building and Pier G, transport hub and approach road plus the control tower.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - B-47 Stratojet
description: The Boeing B-47 was the first swept-wing multi-engine bomber in service with the USAF. It was truly a quantum leap in aviation history, and is the forerunner of numerous jet aircraft types in service today.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - VFR Real Scenery NexGen 3D: Vol. 2 - Central England and North Wales
description: Just Flight's NexGen 3D series of UK photographic scenery combines high resolution photographic textures with accurately placed autogen objects and additional custom scenery objects to give a true '3D' feel to your VFR flights.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Air Hauler 2
description: Take charge of operations both in the boardroom and in the cockpit. 'Go global' and create your own Virtual Airline and recruit other AH2 pilots to fly for you with attractive pay-outs, or you can join another pilot’s booming airline and fly for that alongside your own company.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Fair Dinkum Flights
description: Fair Dinkum Flights, developed by Turbulent Designs, is a mission pack designed to give you the full Australian experience! These ten missions will give you a taste of the kinds of activities undertaken by pilots in Australia every single day including sightseeing tours, cattle mustering, and firefighting.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Consolidated B-24 Liberator
description: The Consolidated B-24 Liberator was produced in greater numbers than any other American combat aircraft of World War II. It served in every branch of the American armed forces, as well as several Allied air forces and navies.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Robinson R44
description: The R44 is a lightweight, versatile, piston-powered four seat helicopter renowned for its economical, reliable, and safe operation. With its sleek design, impressive speed, and unparalleled reliability the R44 delivers the performance of a turbine helicopter at an affordable piston price.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim Canada
description: Toposim Canada for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 11 / 19m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for the whole of Canada, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim Caribbean
description: Toposim Caribbean for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD9-11/19m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for Caribbean, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Salyut π
description: Salyut π is a first person shooter, with a great atmosphere. This game this game is set in a futuristic base, all this with great graphics.

name: Maniac Path
description: You have to go through the path of a brutal killer who, driven by instinct, roams the streets in search of victims.

name: Halloween Rhythm
description: This is a Chiptune Rhythm game for Halloween aficionados everywhere! Six spooky songs with two difficulty settings

name: Ultimatum: Casting
description: We were given an Ultimatum. From whom and why? What is the task and what is the solution? If you accept the challenge, you can find out from the first part of the 3D multi-perspective escape room game series.

name: Holiday Mosaics Christmas Puzzles
description: Holiday Mosaics: Christmas Puzzles – enjoy 120 puzzles made from colorful and breathtaking photos.

name: Spell Blaster
description: Spell Blaster is a 2D top-down action game inspired by retro classics! The game is being developed for PC (with a planned release on Nintendo Switch) and tasks players with navigating mazes, destroying monsters, avoiding dangerous traps and solving perilous puzzles!

name: Crash Race
description: Crash Race is High speeds, abrupt stops and unexpected maneuvers are what awaits you.

name: Fire Boy
description: A hero who talks to the player in a comical way about his actions in the game, adventure in classic 2D platform style, are 5 worlds with different and challenging characteristics. Join the Fire Boy and help him recover all the dinosaur eggs that were stolen by the little monsters.

name: Criminal T
description: Step into the shoes of a newly formed police officer who receives a promotion opportunity for an investigator, but to get it you will have to solve a series of criminal cases.

name: Battle for Esturia
description: A turn-based strategy RPG featuring an open world filled with monsters, dungeons, and interesting characters.

name: ArcticBoy: The Interactive Story
description: A touching story of a young programmer Alexey. One day he meets a girl through a joke site, but who would have thought that Alexei would not be laughing at all. Take a pack of sushi rolls, saddle a snowmobile and go on a long journey to your princess.

name: Slide Mini
description: Slide Mini is a cute turtle racing game playable up to 4 friends in splitscreen. Dive to gain boosts, jump to avoid obstacles, use bonuses and master the sliding mechanics to outrun the hord!

name: Dragon Fury VR
description: This is a fast-paced VR combat game you can control time by use magic, it also has tower defense, melee, archery elements. In this world you will experience the thrills of classic shooter and battle, the charisma of arcane magic.

name: Anime Match
description: Match anime women and win cute pictures!

name: Deep Space Gardening
description: In Deep Space Gardening, up to 4 players work hand in hand to grow plants, which are then sent to planets who need help to recover their ecological system. Unique gardens and game elements, a singleplayer and an online mode guarantee fun for casual and ambitious players of all ages.

name: Castle Constructor
description: Choose your Blocks, Build your Castle, Save the Kingdom! Design a castle using a modular system of blocks. Fend off waves of enemies who will try to climb over and break through your defenses. From lowly soldiers to powerful siege weapons; defeat them all as you strive to protect your kingdom.

name: Space Haters
description: Space Haters is a tough-as-nails vertical shoot 'em up featuring classic arcade-style gameplay and set in the ruthless world of intergalactic music. After his sell-out gig, Photon is on his way to the greatest after-party the galaxy has seen. However, his haters want him gone. For good.

name: 'Member the Alamo?
description: 'Member the Alamo? is a comedy shooter loosely based on the historic battle that birthed Texas. You will fight alongside larger than life heroes as you defend the Alamo from Santa Anna and his Mexican army that outnumber you 100 to 1.

name: Gearshifters
description: Steer, drift, spin, smash and gun through waves of enemy vehicles. Go to war against extreme machine bosses. Build up and tune your tactical loadout of car mods, defences and weaponry for each treacherous transport mission. Drive. Destroy. Get Paid. Upgrade!

name: Patter Warrior
description: This is a first person shooting game，The player plays a special soldier in a small town full of enemies，Players are free to explore the surrounding areas,Players can kill the enemy or avoid the enemy's attack, and try to keep their health value alive for a long time.

name: Spy Story: The Elusive Evidence
description: Explore the delightful world! Solve the most spy layouts you've ever seen!

name: Hexacore
description: HEXACORE is an attention grabbing puzzle game that tests your swiping skills while fighting against time. Get to customize your world of Hexacore with multiple skins and keep your powers at the ready to compete with the world out there. ​​Take on the game and let's see if you survive.

name: Little Fire Girl
description: Relaxing puzzle games to keep you in a good mood

name: Jaeger
description: Jaeger is a third-person MOBA game with a massive character customization and unique combat system.

name: PrisonShow

name: Conrun Virtual Gym
description: Compete against AI in a virtual gym. Earn XP, unlock stages, cosmetics and more.

name: Ebola 2 Survival
description: EBOLA 2 survival - is created in the spirit of the great classics of survival horrors. In this game, you will control the main character with a first-person camera which makes you feel like you’re in a real horror movie.

name: Pocket Penguin: A Game Boy Style Adventure
description: A Game Boy style videogame that tell us the story of a blue penguin that got lost in the sea after the attack of a pirate ship.

name: Forest Dash
description: A fast-paced endless platformer with hundreds of randomized obstacles. Never play the same game twice as you navigate 3 unique levels in this action packed game.

name: The Great Pickle Adventure
description: In The Great Pickle Adventure, a pickle-based platformer, you can compete for the best level times, relax in an RPG world or try your skill in a game of breakout. Become a master of gravity and find your favorite among multiple unique weapons. Explore 20+ unique themed levels and special levels.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Airbus Series Vol.3
description: FeelThere’s Airbus Series Vol. 3 is a detailed depiction of the fascinating world of Fly-By-Wire technology as well as the Airbus’ high-end systems. These powerful aircraft offer unrivaled flying pleasure.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Night Environment: California
description: Night Environment completely revolutionizes night flying in the FSX: Steam Edition world. Using a series of databases, Night Environment adds brilliant, realistic lighting to your simulator. Hundreds of thousands of lights clearly show how highways connect to cities and how smaller roads meander through neighbourhoods.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Boeing 747-200/300
description: Probably the world’s most recognizable airliner, with its distinctive hump on the forward fuselage, the Boeing 747 entered service in the 1970s and has been continually updated with new versions featuring different engines, an extended upper deck area and even a new wing design.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Cessna 182 Skylane RG II
description: The Cessna 182 Skylane is an American four-seat, single-engined light airplane, built by Cessna. First brought to market in 1956 as a tricycle gear variant of the 180, one year later the Cessna 182A was introduced, the first to carry the Skylane name.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - McDonnell Douglas F-4 Phantom II
description: The McDonnell Douglas F-4 Phantom II from SimWorks Studios is the ultimate version of this iconic 1960s aircraft. This stunning aircraft add-on features both the B and N variants, two different versions of the cockpit, immersive and accurate flight dynamics.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - US Cities X: Cleveland
description: US Cities X: Cleveland from Aerosoft with an aerial image detailed to 15cm per pixel and includes more than 640 major buildings modeled, 45,000 realistically placed autogen buildings, four helipads and eight airports including Cleveland Burke Lakefront Airport and Cleveland Hopkins International Airport.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim South Asia
description: Toposim South Asia for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 11/19m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for South Asia, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Night Environment Denmark
description: Night Environment: Denmark for FSX: Steam Edition revolutionizes your night flying experience in Denmark.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Cessna C188 AgTruck
description: Developed by Alabeo, this rendition of the Cessna C188 AgTruck, is both beautifully detailed and faithfully replicated. The team at Alabeo designed and developed this aircraft using feedback from real world agricultural pilots.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim South America
description: Toposim South America for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 11 / 19m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for South America, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Convair R3Y Tradewind
description: In August 1946, Convair was awarded the contract to build the XP5Y-1 maritime patrol aircraft as a replacement for the troublesome PB4Y Coronado and outdated Martin Mars. Convair had ample seaplane experience with the Catalina and Coronado, as well as access to the development data from the German BV-222 'Wiking'.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Piper PA-28-181 Archer III
description: The Archer III is flown all around the world and in addition to our UK research aircraft, G- CIFY, the product will feature liveries from the USA, Canada, France, Australia and Germany.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Republic P-47D Thunderbolt
description: The P-47D (or the 'Jug' as it was affectionately known) was one of the heaviest fighters of World War II. This weight required a very powerful engine so the aircraft was fitted with the same engine that powered the Hellcat and the Vought Corsair

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim US Upper Midwest
description: Toposim US Upper Midwest for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 12 / 10m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for the whole of the Upper Midwest region of the United States, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

description: Night Environment: Massachusetts for FSX: Steam Edition revolutionizes your VFR night flying experience. Using a series of databases, this add-on implements authentic and immersive lighting to different road types and other areas.

name: Tomb Typing
description: Search an ancient Egyptian tomb as you type words and letters to navigate your way through a complicated maze and search for treasures. Beware of walls and dead-end paths! It is easy to get lost so be sure to refer to the map to find your way through the maze

name: Sightbringer
description: Sightbringer is a linear side-scrolling platformer in which a bat-like child traverses dark, cavernous ruins full of monsters in order to complete a ritual to restore light.

name: Sudoku Forever
description: Sudoku lovers have a holiday! We present the game Sudoku Forever, where you have to solve classic Sudoku. -40 new levels - Increasing complexity -Beautiful graphics -Pleasant music

name: Dark Stone: The Lightseeker

name: Tau Cubis
description:
Tau Cubis is a minimalist Tower Defense game in Space and colorful Scifi Landscapes.

Tau Cubis is taking inspiration from the classic 'Defense Grid' with extra features (collaborative Towers, instant global targeting, truly autonomous enemies).

Find a strategy to repel the onslaught of crazy robots!

name: Best Friend
description: A 3rd-person exploration game explore a series of dreams and reconnect with your childhood best friend: your French Bulldog. Take control of both a human and French Bulldog as you experience a violently emotional story. Beware of the collectibles. They determine the fate of your friendship.

name: Anime Feet
description: Anime Feet... A more powerful combo of words doesn't exist. Play our exclusive Puzzle formula and unlock fresh cute anime gal feet for you to appreciate UwU

name: Pineapple Island

name: Slime Sprint
description: Sprint through lava ridden dungeons and attempt to achieve the best time possible in this arcade style 2D platformer. With 30 levels to play and many slimes to unlock, can you achieve the medals needed to become the slime sprint king?

name: Fox! Hen! Bag!
description: In this short first-person adventure game, you have to bring your friends over to the other mountain by using a tramway car. But beware! Each friend has their own agenda. You have to talk to them to decide which order they should be moved in. Based on a classic riddle.

name: Survival Draw

description: The Sacramento International Airport is located 16 km north-west of the Californian Capital and has two terminals and two runways. The add-on provides Sim pilot with a highly detailed airport for FSX and Prepar3D. All the building models have 2k textures, ambient occlusion and reflecting windows.

description: Conceived as a jet-powered replacement for the A-1J Skyraider, Ed Heinemann's design became undoubtedly one of the most successful aircraft ever built. The small and simple approach produced and highly agile and durable machine.

description: The DC-3 was the aircraft that manufacturers wanted to replace with something better and more modern, but it performed so well that a viable replacement wasn't easy to make - hence the saying, “The only aircraft to replace a DC-3 is another DC-3.”

description: Convair's superb F-106 Delta Dart is regarded by those close to it as the best all-weather interceptor ever designed. It was created as an outgrowth of the USAF's interceptor program in 1954. The aircraft used a delta wing design, common at the time because of its immunity to many of the problems experienced by conventional wings at...

description: Heaock is a casual puzzle game with a minimalist style similar to Sokoban, designed to free players from worries and feel a moment of tranquility.

name: Zonex
description: ZONEX is a 3D realtime dynamic effects showcase with both PC and VR support.

name: The Banana Saved the World
description: The Banana Saved The World is a classic platform game with levels to go as well as end-of-level bosses Avoid traps and enemies, to defend yourself you only have one stone to throw at them

name: Tormans
description: Tormans is an open world, tactical RPG in a post-technology setting. You can do anything, go everywhere and become adventurer, rogue, to travel through the ruins of an ancient unknown world of about 1220 km. Do your best to write own history in this harsh realm and understand what happened here.

name: Disaster Drive
description: Disaster Drive is a retro-inspired arcade racing game where you only have 10 seconds to reach the next checkpoint, or it's GAME OVER. Skillfully drift around twisty corners using nitro boost while avoiding disaster to multiply your score to the top!

name: Endlight
description: Break through and outlast shifting, twisting, chaos. Fly through surreal landscapes desperately trying to get hoops. Dodging is impossible, so start smashing.

name: Metallic Metronome
description: Slash down the monsters - with rhythm!

name: Phobyark
description: Phobyark is a new type of platformer / horror game that will immerse you in the twists and turns of phobias !

name: 深陷迷宫
description: This is a kind of fun maze game, if you are still struggling to find an interesting maze, then come to experience it.

name: Deadly Daycare VR
description: Deadly Daycare is a VR experience where you must take care of a cast of chaotic creatures before they destroy you and your daycare!

name: Lazy gang
description: The main characters will have to reluctantly unite in a mercenary squad and go on an adventure to distant islands.

name: The Forsaken Ruins
description: The Forsaken Ruins is a first-person atmospheric horror game. As prisoner of Ever-Bleed Keep, your chance to escape has come. Delve deep into the ruins and try to survive long enough to unravel its dark history and your true identity.

name: Baby Coyote
description: The Arts And Craft Islands Awaits for your arrival, Join Coyote and General Warthog on a tropical Platforming Adventure across this creative archipelago, to save The Craft Kingdom from the Evil Captain Fat Cat.

name: FPV Speed Drone
description: The FPV Speed ​​Drone is set in an environment where an actual international game was held. It provides a realistic FPV drone racing flight experience. Compete with your friends and set the best record!

name: 雪糕猫
description: It's a world where only strange cats live. They have prepared some challenges to welcome the new members. And you are the one who is about to join them.

name: Miss You
description: Put together the puzzle so that the girl can appreciate your effort, and show all her charms in private video.

name: From Space
description: From Space is a solo and co-op action-shooter for squads up to four players. Take on the challenge of liberating the earth from an alien infestation with your friends, using over-the-top weaponry in a post-apocalyptic world with awesomely stylized graphics. The apocalypse has never been so much fun!

name: Project Blue Book: Hidden Mysteries
description: It’s 1952, and the U.S. Air Force is operating a top-secret investigation: Project Blue Book. As a newly recruited agent, it’s your job to uncover the truth behind these real declassified UFO sightings. Test your observation and investigation skills in this out-of-this-world hidden object adventure!

name: Wild Wild Chess
description: The classical game of chess... now played in the Wild West! Play chess against your friends or versus the computer, unlock new scenarios and chess pieces and prove yourself to be the wildest gunslinger in the old west!

name: Damn, what was yesterday?
description: Damn, what was yesterday? Is an adventure game that tells how a regular party of old friends can end.

name: Pictoglyph
description: Pictoglyph is a Nonogram/Picross style puzzle game in which the player learns and remembers a set of shapes represented by symbols, which have to be marked on a grid using clues and logic.

name: No More Home
description: Tactical cooperation FPS, you are part of an elite commando force, came to free the city from the "Salvagers" claw. Terrible extra-terrestrial machines that are here to exploit the earth's resources. Are you gonna just run into the fight? Or play stealth and safe?

name: Color Phase
description: Experience a colorful puzzle-platformer experience in Color Phase! Find and use different colors to interact with the world around you in a variety of different ways to reach your goal!

name: Franz Fury
description: Post-apocalyptic, top-down, arcade-action-murder-racing game. Drive the most brutal weapon-packed musclecar you can imagine!

name: Just Defense
description: "Just Defense" is a simple Topdown view defense game.Upgrade your weapons, build turrets and kill enemies.

name: Curse Lsland
description: Try to survive on a mysterious island full of zombies!

name: Soulace
description: Soulace takes you on the journey trough the after death realms. Immerse yourself into beautiful and relaxing meditative environments in this point and click VR Adventure experience.

name: Flood Fill
description: Flood Fill is a fast paced action-arcade game. The concept is easy, the game is not. Avoid the enemies, and section off areas of the map. Section off enough of the map, advance to the next level.

name: Kojou
description: You and your friends are staying in Kojou castle for a night - but one of you is a killer. Find them before the night breaks - or fail and be forced to choose between running or hiding to stay alive..

name: Dungeons and Kingdoms
description: Build your kingdom, grow your population, adventure into the wilds as a party of heroes, explore dungeons, trade, survive and prosper.

name: 破坏效应
description: 《破坏效应》是一款融合了MMO和MOBA双玩法的游戏，暗黑式ARPG英雄乱斗、立体地下城对战、非对称式英雄阵营、自定义动作技能，开启不一样的战场体验。力求让玩家体验最没有束缚的乱斗快感，从一场战斗开始，你无所不能，异世英雄，即刻乱斗上场！

name: The Drained Goddess
description: The Drained Goddess is a first-person 3D action horror game. You will have to investigate what happened long ago. But those evil entities have been watching you and waiting for your return for decades. Will you try to defeat and expel them? Or just get what you need and sneak away?

name: Adventure Mosaics: Small Islanders
description: 200 colorful nonograms, just the way you like it! Choose your favorite island!

name: Super Catboy
description: Super Catboy is an action-packed platformer in a high-bit pixel art style which combines the best elements of the golden 16-bit platformer era of the 90s - enhanced with new ideas! But most importantly: cat content!

name: Countdown Final Zone
description: Countdown Final Zone is a dynamic first person shooter. You have to battle on large post-apocalyptic maps using various weapons. Prepare yourself for epic fight on battle royal mode, deathmath, team deathmatch and zombie anihilation.

name: Underfire
description: Underfire is a dynamic multiplayer team war game. You have to fight on stragic maps using various weapons up to 8 players. By correctly managing your current arsenal and skills, you must lead your team to victory!

name: Click Quest
description: Click Quest is an erotic adventure clicker, with 4 beautiful naked girls in different poses. With awesome 2D animation, this is a must play!

name: The Lost Game: Royal Game of Ur
description: The Royal Game of Ur is a board game thought to be played as early as 2600BC. The Lost Game seeks to restore this ancient tradition with a twist. The board is entirely customizable, allowing players to reshape the strategy of the game and even share it with others through the Steam Workshop.

name: Beautiful Masseuse
description: Players in the game as a beautiful masseuse, running a massage shop. Daily reception of all kinds of city beauty, for their feet and legs massage. Relieve their stress and fulfill self little hobbies.

name: Alchemy Absorption: Melody
description: In the world in which Silas resides, there exists many different non-human races. Experience his story in this visual novel about falling in love with a flirtatious dark fairy whose aura infatuates those around her.

name: Cats Warriors
description: Cats Warriors is a strategy game made in 2D hand-drawn graphics with cute cats.

name: Conqueror's Blade: Season II - Wrath of the Nomads
description:
A realm of infinite opportunity draws aspiring conquerors from afar, but there are those who have always been here, and always will be… Through the piercing bite of winter, drought, famine, and unspeakably blood-soaked chapters in their war-torn history, the nomadic tribes endure.
The Sons of the Steppes are warriors who hail from the great rolling steppes of the north. They live off the land while enduring the harshest environments, yet their combat skills have decided the fates of empires in the past. Knowledge is power, and their survival skills and history within this land makes many warlords eager to draw swords with them.

name: Dark Roll: Free Kick Challenge
description: A ball rolling game, where you take football free kicks. Single player challenges, Steam Leaderboards and ranked multiplayer. Free to play.

name: Mecha Destruction
description: Mecha Destruction - Beta is a simple top down game where you destroy cities as a giant Mecha robot. A love letter to Mecha and Kaiju culture, the game will soon feature fights against enemy monsters and a campaign with multiplayer planned as well.

name: The Firelord
description: The Firelord is a platformer arena that tells of the adventures of a fire mage. Discover new abilities, create your own build and challenge the strongest fire magicians!

name: Fantasy Sprite Island
description: Fantasy Sprite Island is a collection of spirit capture training, home construction, copy adventure and other business development type of game.

name: Mini Island: Spring
description: Mini Island: Spring is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty!

name: Aimi
description: Memories swirl all around you...Or are these memories? Familiar faces and places you think you remember but somehow now seem so different. Why are you here? Where is here?

name: Bocce VR Simulator
description: Bocce VR Simulator is a perfect simulation game where you can experience every detail of bocce game. No matter if you are an amateur or professional bocce player you can step in and compete with AI or friend

name: Messy Room Simulator
description: Attention! This game IS NOT a training software that helps you organize your room better. On the contrary, it may in turn affect you in reality in some way. The room, whether the result is good or bad, the author of this game WILL NOT be responsible for it!

name: Internet Generation
description: The story of a group chat being unpopular. Administrators abuse authority, and the group chat leader is not in charge, causing group members to suffer unspeakably. As a newcomer, you will pick up your keyboard and overthrow the tyranny of the group chat leader and administrators!

name: Quest 4 Papa: Reloaded
description: Quest 4 Papa: Reloaded is a story-driven top-down shooter experience where the player will upgrade its equipment as it progressively faces greater dangers through its adventure.

name: Nobody's Quest
description: A cozy sandbox RPG adventure in a mini pixelated open world. Explore the realm of Hubbington, collect crafting materials and resources, save the citizens of Hubb Burg so they can help you in return, defeat Evil spawns and face your ultimate foe!

name: Widgets and Gidgets
description: You are a lowly gnome, making parts, earning shinnies, building (and repairing) machines on a quest to earn 1 million shinnies.

name: Fraulein Lolita First Date With You
description: 这是一款美少女+卡牌相结合的同人游戏。游戏将用卡牌呈现你与洛璃在圣诞夜的浪漫约会，约会就像是一场战斗，巧妙地化解约会中的各种尴尬，寻找突破口，与洛璃一同度过甜蜜一夜吧！使用卡牌解决发生的事件，你要如何应对女友偶然的小脾气呢？赌上尊严和器量，洛璃的征服战——开幕！

name: Little Octopus
description: Take control of your very own reversible octopus plushie! How high can you bounce?

name: Candy Bear 2
description: In this family-friendly 2-d action game, you are a bear dodging green bunnies and collecting delicious candy. You're running over bricks, climbing up ladders, traversing bars, floating on moving platforms, and pushing crates to reach the next level. Includes over 240 levels for hours of fun.

name: Commissar Catlov
description: The new leader of the Rats has begun threatening other animals and this is getting serious. But Catlov and his alliances are not going to let this arrogant rat to break the peace and are ready to take the necessary steps to withstand this aggression.

name: Into the Knight
description: Endless waves of enemies are attacking as you attempt to stay alive during your ill-fated quest. Show your honor by fending them off for as long as you can.

name: Uploaded
description: Uploaded is a fast-paced, parkour, online multiplayer, and single-player shooter created by only one developer where you play as a robot with a human mind uploaded to it.

name: Boots Versus Plants
description: In the platformer from the creators of RRRR fights with mutant plants on the way to find a solution to the dark past. Overcome many thoughtful challenges and puzzles.

name: Cat Colony Crisis
description: You are tasked with helping a colony ship full of space-faring cats deal with a mysterious disease outbreak! Will you act fast and stop the spread of this disease or will it spread unchecked and ravage your Cat Colony.

name: 1001 Jigsaw Home Sweet Home Wedding Ceremony
description: 1001 Jigsaw. World Tour: Home Sweet Home is an exciting puzzle game and holiday feeling in 500 high-quality photos.

name: Mey Rescuer
description: It involves mechanics of eliminating enemies and solving puzzles with the weapon that also puts blocks, while going through floating islands in your adventure

name: Your planet in 60 seconds
description: Your planet in 60 seconds is a deck and world building game on different and beautiful planets all over the universe.

name: Bubble With Djealy
description: Bubble With Djealy Its a bubble game Shoot the bubbles and by 3 bubbels or more they wil remove and you get points

name: Conqueror's Blade: Season III - Soldiers of Fortune
description:
The resurgence of nomads from the Steppes saw occupied lands reclaimed, ill-gotten treasures seized, and once-proud noblemen driven into exile. Escaping with what little gold they could carry, the disgraced lords travelled south to recruit an infamous band of sellswords, armed to the teeth with heavy weapons and gunpowder armaments, to exact vengeance and restore their glory.
These soldiers of fortune hail from Sicania, their pockets lined with gold and their notorious reputations preceding them. They count among their ranks deadly crossbowmen, fearless swordsmen, cutting-edge artillery, and cavalry killers fighting in the name of a legendary mercenary. They are coming, and their hammers of reckoning will fall upon this land as if it were an anvil.

name: Attack from Planet Smiley
description: Attack from Planet Smiley is a retro arcade game where the aim of the game is to survive. Survive a horde of angry smiley faces invading your world. The only way to stop them? Your lasers, nukes and mad skills.

name: Geometric Sniper: Blood in Paris
description: Katy, a French sniper, needs to protect her magnificent city! A 2D sniper game like you've never seen! In this spin-off of the Geometric Sniper the missions are more and more challenging, you will not have a second chance. Accuracy is everything!

name: Pingers
description: Pingers is an addictive 'one-more-round' score chaser which is perfect to play solo or with friends. Ping your way to victory and see just how far you can get!

name: Snowboard
description: Go snowboarding and earn points.

name: Sophstar
description: A vertical arcade shoot'em up with an inventive teleport system, lots of fast-blazing action and explosions, tons of boss fights, a risk/reward based score system and a proper challenge for both veteran and new players of the genre.

name: Kingdomonium
description: The medieval procedurally generated side-scrolling real time strategy game. Build up and command your kingdom to explore and conquer the land. Forage, chop, dig, mine, build, fish, sail, explore and strategically battle your way to greatness!

name: Mysterious: Dark Journey
description: Mysterious: Dark Journey - is an action platformer, where you explore mythical lands full of enigmatic creatures and dangerours passages, hidden behind the Gates. Transform to use different abilities in order to overcome challenges that are waiting for you.

name: The Only Wise
description: A non-linear detective, where you, based on the knowledge gained, make decisions and investigate the case. This is a short story with no markers or directions, only information. You, the player, decide what is right and what to do. What turns out to be true?

name: Spock in the Dama Kingdom
description: Discover the Dama Kingdom in Spock, a great fantasy adventure game !

name: Galia Senki: Yuuhen Annales
description: This is a strategy game taking place during the Gallic War.

name: Escape Knox Manor
description: Escape rooms are fun! But Escape Knox Manor asks the question what if you were actually kidnapped? And what if you had to escape a mansion? Find out now!

name: Lucifer: Paradise Lost
description: Finally the long awaited prequel to Jesus Christ RPG is out! Play as Lucifer, the devious dark angel, in this retro arcade styled four-directional shooter.

name: Empire of the Wicked
description: A magical challenging indie top-down RPG where you have to dismantle the Empire of the Wicked by leveling up, completing quests, training skills, slaying bosses and collecting items/equipment. Compete online with other players in the gladiator arena to claim exclusive rewards!

name: Buddy's Creative Quest!
description: Buddy's Creative Quest! is a short, cheat code based, atmospheric plat-former! Unlock over 50 cheat codes to alter the gameplay!

name: Steel & Bone
description: Explore the mysterious aristocrat's dungeon in this free and short but exciting dungeon crawler.

name: Bub Block
description: A fast-paced multiplayer party game with blocks, spinning blades, and ghosts. Oh my!

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - North American T-6 Texan
description: The North American T-6 Texan was an excellent design that served as a basic transitional combat trainer in all branches of U.S. service as well as in countries worldwide. U.S. Navy pilots utilised the type under the SNJ designation, the most common versions being the SNJ-4, SNJ-5 and SNJ-6.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Grumman F4F Wildcat & Martlet
description: Developed by Just Flight, the Wildcat and Martlet add-on for FSX: Steam Edition contains four different aircraft - the Grumman F4F-3 and F4F-4 Wildcats and also the Martlet I and Martlet IV, the British name given to the F4F-3 and F4F-4-based aircraft which were supplied to Britain from the earliest days of WWII.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Night Environment Italy
description: Night Environment: Italy for FSX: Steam Edition revolutionizes your night flying experience in Italy.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim Australia
description: Toposim Australia for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 11/19m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for Australia, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Beechcraft Duchess 76
description: The Beechcraft Duchess 76 is a popular twin engine General Aviation training and touring aircraft around the world. This model for FSX: Steam Edition comes with an authentic avionics suite, a realistic set of liveries, and is based on detailed research on the actual real-world aircraft featured in the software.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - McDonnell F3H-2 Demon
description: McDonnell Aircraft's F3H Demon was the firm's first swept-wing jet fighter. The aircraft was conceived in 1949 as the XF3H-1, with the first flight taking place in 1951. Unfortunately, the original power plant proved unsatisfactory, though despite this the F3H-1N set an unofficial time-to-climb record in 1955 of 10,000 feet in 71...

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Cessna 152
description: The C152 is a two-seater, piston-engine aircraft equipped with a fixed tricycle landing gear, 110hp four-cylinder engine and fixed-pitch propeller – an ideal aircraft for touring and flight training.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Night Environment: Connecticut
description: Night Environment: Connecticut for FSX: Steam Edition revolutionizes your VFR night flying experience. Using a series of databases, this add-on implements authentic and immersive lighting to different road types and other areas.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Airbus A318/A319
description: Fly-by-wire fans rejoice! This add-on is a high fidelity and massively detailed rendition of the Airbus A318 and A319 for FSX: Steam Edition. Developed by Aerosoft, this add-on contains exquisite models as well as all of the systems that are used in day to day flights in the real world.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - McDonnell Douglas DC-8 Series 10 - 40
description: The McDonnell Douglas DC-8 Series 10 - 40 was one of the first commercial jet airliners to ever enter service. The four-engine narrow-body airliner featured advanced aerodynamic and structural designs resulting in a very reliable, comfortable, and efficient aircraft.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim US West Coast
description: Toposim US West Coast for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 12 / 10m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for the West Coast of the United States, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim Mexico
description: Toposim Mexico for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD12 / 10m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for the whole of Mexico, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim Southern Africa
description: Toposim South Africa for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 11 / 19m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for the whole Southern African region, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Night Environment: Spain
description: Night Environment: Spain for FSX: Steam Edition revolutionizes your night flying experience in Spain.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim East Africa
description: Toposim East Africa for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 11 / 19m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for the whole Eastern African region, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - First Flight Airport (KFFA)
description: This terrific scenery covers an extensive, detailed area around KFFA and includes the towns of Kill Devil Hills, Kitty Hawk and numerous islands in the region

name: BigChick
description: Be the Chicken Moses! Let your chickens go!

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Cessna C172RG Cutlass
description: The C172RG Cutlass II is a modification of the venerable C172, with differences including a retractable landing gear, variable-pitch constant-speed propeller and more powerful 180HP engine. These modifications resulted in a 20-knot increase in cruise speed. A total of 1,177 of the variant were constructed between 1980 and 1984.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Stinson L-5 Sentinel
description: The Stinson L-5 is typical of the type of aircraft developed during WWII for duties such as liaison, artillery spotting, photo-reconnaissance, and casualty evacuation. Rugged and dependable, the design is a true 'workhorse', showing little to no concern for aesthetics and equipped with no unnecessary embellishments.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Cessna C337H Skymaster
description: The Cessna Model 337 ‘Skymaster’ is a six seat, twin engine, civil utility aircraft, built in a ‘push-pull’ configuration. It shares the typical nose mounted engine configuration of other single engine models in the Cessna range but has the second engine mounted in the rear of its pod style fuselage.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Airbus Series Vol.4
description: FeelThere’s Airbus Series Vol. 4 is a detailed depiction of the fascinating world of Fly-By-Wire technology - as well as the Airbus’ high-end systems. These powerful aircraft offer unrivaled flying pleasure.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Conington Airfield
description: Conington, otherwise known as Peterborough Business Airport (ICAO: EGSF) is a privately owned airfield located in the UK county of Cambridgeshire, six miles south of Peterborough and twenty miles north-west of Cambridge.

name: Primal Dungeon
description: Throw bones, big rocks or use your spirit wolf special attack to kill a variety of enemies in this 2D platformer full action game.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Farm Strips Vol 2: Central and Southern England
description: Return to grassroots flying in the UK with Farm Strips Volume 2: Central and Southern England. This scenery pack is a collection of 18 airstrips recreating the small airfields often used by microlights and ultralights across southeast England.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Cessna CT210M Centurion II
description: The 210M Centurion has been designed to push the limits of what can be achieved in these host simulators and delivers high quality detail to satisfy even the most demanding private pilot’s needs.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim Southeast Asia
description: Toposim Southeast Asia for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 11/19m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for Southeast Asia, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Convair XB-46
description: Back in 1947, Consolidated Vultee's beautiful jet bomber was dropped in favor of Boeing's superior B-47 Stratojet.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Cessna C172N Skyhawk II
description: Said to be the most successful training aircraft ever produced, the Cessna 172 Skyhawk first entered production in 1958, since when more than 40,000 have been built. The ‘N’ model was introduced in 1977 and featured an upgraded engine, with additional options such as air conditioning and larger fuel tanks becoming available before the...

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition: Farm Strips Vol 3 - South West England & Wales
description: Return to grassroots flying in the UK with Farm Strips Volume 3: South West England & Wales. This scenery pack is a collection of 18 airstrips recreating the small airfields often used by microlights and ultralights across South West England and Wales.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Steamboat Springs (KSBS)
description: The City of Steamboat Springs is an internationally known winter ski resort destination. The Steamboat Springs tourism industry is highlighted by Steamboat Ski Resort, which is on Mount Werner in the Park Range just east of the town.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Airbus A320/A321
description: Fly-by-wire fans rejoice! This add-on is a high fidelity and massively detailed rendition of the Airbus A320 and A321 for FSX: Steam Edition. Developed by Aerosoft, this add-on contains exquisite models as well as all of the systems that are used in day to day flights in the real world.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - US Cities X: Las Vegas
description: Fly through the Grand Canyon and over the iconic Vegas strip in US Cities X: Las Vegas for FSX: Steam Edition. Located in the middle of the Nevada desert, Las Vegas is characterized by low buildings with a concentration of high-rise hotels and casinos along one central strip.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Ajaccio
description: This beautiful scenery is massive and covers the entire seaside area for the Bay of Ajaccio. Over 13,000 custom objects are included in this stunning scenery, plus a detailed version of the LFKJ airport.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - US Cities X: San Francisco
description: US Cities X: San Francisco is an excellent add-on for FSX:SE which should be explored, experienced and enjoyed. Many of the famous areas around the city are included, such as the Golden Gate Bridge and the bay area.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Night Environment: Sweden
description: Night Environment: Sweden for FSX: Steam Edition revolutionizes your night flying experience in Sweden.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - North American F-86F-1 Sabre
description: The F-86 Sabre was a natural replacement for the F-80 Shooting Star. First introduced in 1949 for the United States Air Force, the F-86 featured excellent performance for its day, outstanding handling characteristics, and high adaptability. The Sabre served in a number of NATO-aligned countries and was even produced in Canada.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Grumman Gulfhawk II
description: In the 1930s the Grumman Aircraft Company was looking for ways to promote its new line of fast biplane fighter-bombers, so in 1936 an F3F-1 was equipped with a 1,000-horsepower Wright Cyclone engine and specially modified for high-stress manoeuvring and aerobatics.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Boeing 767-200/300
description: The 767 may live in the shadow of the larger 747, but the sturdy and efficient 767 files on many of the same routes worldwide. This wide body aircraft sits between the narrow body 757 and the Jumbo 747, and is used for both short and long haul duties.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - F-105D Thunderchief
description: The Republic F-105 Thunderchief, first flown in 1955 and often known as "Thud" by its pilots, was a rugged and reliable multi-role fighter with an emphasis on low-altitude, high-speed penetration strikes with a single nuclear bomb.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Seychelles
description: The world-famous tropical paradise of the extensive Seychelles island group has now come to FSX: Steam Edition! Located in the Indian Ocean, north of Madagascar and approximately 600 nautical miles away from the African continent, the Seychelles consist mostly of coral islands with more mountainous terrain on the islands Mahé and Praslin...

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - US Cities X: Los Angeles
description: Los Angeles is a major hub for air travel in the United States. Not only are there several major airports in the area, but there is a large general aviation presence as well. Additionally, there are more helipads in Los Angeles than in any other city.

name: Ocolast
description:
Ocolast is a parody horror game based on Outlast and the gay pornographic movie 'Ursos Grandes, Peludos e Mansos', which has since been considered 'one of the most reverberated memes on Brazilian internet' for its notorious scenes and phrases.

The objective of the game is to investigate what is going on in the 'Big, Hairy and Meek Bear Private Reserve' and stop the perpetrator of all the OCO in that place.

name: Stormblades
description: Combat-heavy fantasy RPG with a focus on fast-paced sword-swinging combat

name: Frikin the Laser Shark
description: A 2D bullet hell platform shooter where you play as a normal shark...with a laser strapped to his head. Battle through worlds to defeat the dastardly denizens of the deep lead by the mean mustachio'd menace himself!

name: Cartridge Monsters
description: Cartridge Monsters is a Monster Catching RPG with over 6 hours of gameplay. 5 dungeons, 2 towns and a main story with side quests. Travel, battle and catch new monsters.

name: Euclyca
description: Euclyca is a modern day Hentai-Esque JRPG with fantasy elements. You take on the role of Ashe, an inspiring individual who is enlisting into the Euclyca Corps to become a Guardian and protect his/her homeland from the strange invaders who wreck havoc on the planet.

name: Triblock
description: A little bit of Tetris, a little bit of match 3.

name: Lodestar
description: Lodestar sends you and your squad of friends on your own space odyssey. Transverse multiple planets in a journey to get home without losing yourself or your ship to the perils of the unknown! Gather resources, farm asteroids, and survive... with your own oh-so welcoming AI sidekick!

name: Decently Bad Tower Defense
description: This is a bad short Tower Defense game made from scratch as a new game developer. This game does all the basic things you expect from a tower defense. We have 3 types of enemies and 3 types of tower to destroy them with. Strategic placement of the towers will make your victory certain.

name: Mourning Inc.
description: There is a place where it helps to process what we have lost in our life. There is a place where new special guests always arrive and leave. There is a place where it helps to let go of the past and you start to live future. This is Mourning Inc!

name: Bad Meme
description: ENDLESS MEMES ROTATING LIKE CRAZY - How far can you get before you eat dirt!?

name: Himeko Maid
description: Join Suzuka as she enters the first Himeko Maid contest! Choose your maid, complete the events, and become an expert in Night Service Training!

name: Angel Sex Pet
description: An innocent angel comes to Earth but runs out of energy before she can make the return trip home. Turns out a human's "love" is what Charlotte gets her energy from. Being a pent-up single guy living on their own, Takeshi has A LOT of love he can pump her full of!

name: Fox Spirit: A Two-Tailed Adventure
description: Dazzle humanity or destroy it as a magical, two-tailed fox! Weave illusions, shapeshift, or control minds. You'll set the world on fire, one way or another.

name: KnockDown
description: KnockDown is an entertaining fun for children of all ages. The aim is to hit tin cans with a ball and clear them away. In 160 funny and creative levels you can prove your dexterity, precision and timing. In addition a smart strategy can always be helpful.

name: Ripshot
description: Ripshot is a fast paced DieselPunk hover racer with grappling hooks! A new take on the classic hover racing genre. Swing around corners and use your Ripshot to gain a competitive edge.

name: Abiko the Miko
description: Japanese female shaman fight against "yokai"! This is a shooting action game!

name: Incremental Epic Hero
description: Incremental, Idle, RPG, Japanese Anime Game! Incremental Epic Hero is a free-to-play idle game with Japanese cute anime!

name: Cyber-Ante
description: You are being hacked by increasing amounts of hackers who use many different techniques to get in the system. All you need to do is use your abilities to hit all the switches that shut down the ports that the hackers are coming in on. But, watch out, there are many different ways they can successfully hack in.

name: Otome the Exorcist
description: When the city of Himori is struck by nests of terrifying Voracites, the only ones who can counter the scourge are individuals known as Exorcists.

name: AHH!!! MazeZing
description: A first person maze game.

name: Castle survival
description: Castle survival is a game where you need to destroy an enemy castle with your army.

name: Ninja Leagues: Masters of The Mystic Arts
description: Two teams of elite ninja face off in the arena to secure the legendary Power Scroll. They must smash through the opposing teams defenses to reach the scoring gate. That's all easier said than done when everyone uses their full arsenal of deadly Ninja Arts and weapons to come out ahead.

name: Journey to Moonray
description: Journey to Moonray is a hypnotic, top-down twin-stick shooter featuring silky smooth visual FX and intense combat. Journey to Moonray offers beautiful shaders built on fluid physics to create a unique and surreal visual experience combined with classic, top-down twinstick shmup action

name: DreamScript
description: DreamScript is an educational first person puzzle game. Reprogram your environment, complete tasks and explore the dreamy world of DreamScript.

name: Zombie Dungeon
description: This is a game that looks very simple, enjoy frustration, time and time again.Drag the character to the end, use unique weapons to overcome various difficulties in the process, that's all of this game!

name: Pentaquin: Deeds of Twilight
description: Pentaquin: Deeds Of Twilight is a hand-drawn 2D-Platformer Game, combining beautiful art and music with a deep, dark story all about re-uniting your broken family in a world shattered by war.

name: Bromeliad
description: In Bromeliad you are stranded on a pacific island where you are a Human-Bear. You will have to survive, gathering materials to build tools and bases. You will need to hunt for food, explore, tame animals, then, at night strange creatures will appear. Survive and find an element to return to normal.

name: Planeta
description: Planeta is a planet-building game where you can create and customize your planet as you wish! Main goal is to create conditions for humans to live and build a rocket ship and fly to the moon!

name: Critters for Sale: Snake
description: An intense psychedelic point-and-click/visual novel following the events that will transpire in 2033 in a club called Limelight. A club with ties to aliens, secret societies, alternate timelines, and a doomsday machine.

name: Lost Remnant: Roaches to Riches
description: A Point & Click Management game of Incomprehensible Entities, Survival and Discovery. Inspired by SCP and Cultist Simulator, with Cosmic Horror elements.

name: Funtime with Buffy
description: Things are not going so well since you've been left alone in the house. Your friendly plushie toy, Buffy, is not so friendly anymore. Otherwise he's haunting you all along.

name: Broken Thorns: West Gate
description: A symbolic story where you play as a stranger who just came from cursed land, searching for peace in this wretched world. You will wander through the dying world, finding yourself in different situations where evil forces will try to stop you by using your fears, doubts, and weaknesses.

name: Proven: A Math RPG
description: Proven: A Math RPG is a retro-style role-playing game (RPG) that teaches math while never forgetting that it is a game!

name: Choco Pixel 6
description: Choco Pixel 6 is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space and avoiding traps.

name: Conqueror's Blade: Season IV - Blood of the Empire
description:
As noblemen, nomads and sellswords fight tooth and nail for dominion of this coveted land, a new shadow is cast. The ascendant Anadolou Empire marches north under the banner of Sultan Fatih Suleyman IV, a keen tactician who has named himself heir to the Conqueror's City and all the lands surrounding it. With numbers legion and battle prowess beyond measure, their sights are set on total dominion.

While some rely on brute force in warfare, the Anadolou Empire values patience, discipline, and more strategic measures to attain victory. As the Sultan's father once told him, to exploit a fatal flaw in the enemy's very foundations - a crack in their armour, a moment of indecision, a door left unlocked - is to utterly obliterate them. The old world will yield, or it will bleed.

name: Despatch: Entity Astray
description: Imagine waking up in an unknown environment. It’s dark. You have no idea where and who you are. Only a small alarm light flashes somewhere in the room. Something seems off. The room is filled with a strange soundscape. Start your adventure now and bring light into the unknown darkness.

name: Rotego
description: A puzzle platformer where you must tether to finish! Hold space while jumping to shoot out a tether, which will shift the gravity towards any surface it connects with.

name: Bears In Space
description: Unleash your inner bear in this over-the-top bullet-hell FPS! Embark on a zany retro-futuristic adventure and destroy oil-thirsty robots with an outrageous arsenal. Transform into a bear, wield unique powers, and embrace the absurd fast-paced action of Bears in Space!

name: Pornocrates
description: Pornocrates is the queen of absolute pleasure. Her obsession is to create obscene parties for guests from different parts of the world (eccentric sex-loving guests).

name: Snake Man's Adventure
description: Help Snake-Man save the Earth! ...And maybe even the whole galaxy in this unique platform adventure. Make new friends from all over the universe. Explore numerous environments to find hidden secrets, but watch out for enemies and obstacles - it's time to prove that a snake can be a hero too!

name: Midnight Stories 2
description: This game has three erotic episodes and features multiple voice selection, a multitude of options and game path, animations and 4K renders.

name: Lighthouse of Madness
description: Embark on this Lovecraft-inspired tale and discover the mysteries that await you in this island. Explore the enigmatic lighthouse, solve challenging puzzles and most importantly: try not to lose your sanity when facing the darkness of your mind.

name: Boom! VR
description: Dance the night away on the Boom!VR festival. We prepared a unique VR festival site for you to go crazy on the dance floor or just hang out and enjoy the music.

name: Snake in the Cube
description: "Snake in the Cube" - original, retro game, based on old snake games, remastered in 3D.

name: Annie and the Shadow Palace
description: Annie's shadow has lost her body and is trapped in the shadow palace. Her shadow must balance light and dark to navigate the winding walls and endless tunnels to escape.

name: Wet Steps
description: Have a relationship with a charming priestess! An urban fantasy short and brisk visual novel with elements of slavic mythology.

name: Everless
description: This Is a 2D top-down puzzle game which takes place in a fantasy world. Explore a top-down world, moving obstacles to progress through the game while using your brain to see if you can figure out what to do next!

name: NightmAR Protocol
description: Take control of Azael, a young magician who is now forced to survive against the Host's demons inside an artificially constructed reality. Experience a unique blend between a 3D dark fantasy environment and 2D hand-drawn horrors. Learn new spells and hone your reflexes to survive.

name: Insect: Bombardier beetle
description: Insect: Bombardier beetle - a game about beetle survival in the aggressive world of ants. Find and destroy all enemies yourself or use other insects and creatures to achieve the goal.

name: Archer boy
description: Archer boy is a game in which you need to defend a castle. Get coins for destroying opponents. Buy upgrades for coins. Beat your previous record.

name: Water Rain
description: On another planet in the future, you set up shop in order to try to rake in money, but you aren't the only one who has the same idea.

name: Peace, Death! 2
description: Peace, Death! 2 is a midcore turn-based logic game where you send clients to Hell, Heaven, or Purgatory and help members of the Reapers Union as they work towards their great cause!

name: Sam & MaRU
description: Program robots to solve issues around Singularity Corporation’s factory. Make sure to keep your head down and eyes focused on your work tasks that take the form of puzzles. Don’t worry, Singularity has everyone’s best interest at heart and would never be planning something sinister...

name: Conqueror's Blade: Season V - Legacy of Fire
description:
Over 100 years ago, King John I Kainurgos enjoyed a reckless and chaotic ascent to power over the Kingdom of Empyros. The young king promised much to many to secure his throne and was faced the daunting task of restoring his kingdom to its former glory. He mustered an army of knights from across the land called the Symmachean Brotherhood, assembled the kingdom's greatest minds to create weapons of fire and destruction, and set out across the sea in search of land and treasure.

Together with the Symmchean Brotherhood, the Empyrean forces found the Anadolou region. Their campaign showed promise, but time, gold, and bloodlust can turn even the loyal and chivalrous against their allies. The Brotherhood made a power play, and the ensuing struggle forced the hopelessly outnumbered Empyreans to fight back with their fire weapons. The subsequent desolation of forests, farmlands, and townships stoked resentment and fire in the hearts of the citizens of Anadolou that would burn fiercely for years to come...

name: Dungeons & Guns
description: Dungeons & Guns is a pixel art visual, dungeon crawler style game, where the player aims to advance as far as possible through the enemy crowded dungeons, until reaching the final challenge. After this, new challenges will arise.

name: Planet Hop
description: Planet Hop is a game for the Gameboy. It is a family-friendly, pick up and play retro style action platformer, reminiscent of past Nintendo Gameboy games series, such as Mario Land and Kirby.

name: Tiny Strife
description: Tiny Strife is a roguelike turn-based combat game. Control up to three heroes as you advance through the debris of a planet destroyed by Shub'Guth and confront his minions.

name: PP Puncher
description: PP Puncher is a turn-based RPG, mostly text-based, about a guy going on a quest to save his waifus, by punching his opponents' PP. The game stacks new game mechanics to the fight system, as the player progresses into the game.

name: Velocity Vector
description: Velocity Vector grants you a chance to challange your VR gaming skills in a form of a fast paced action/platformer/racing game. You jump on platforms, you drift through the race track, you fly in tunnels!

name: Magical Girl
description: Unscramble the tiles to help a young girl recover her magic power and Follow the magic patterns to cast her spells. Enjoy fully animated scenes and Discover the girl's story by connecting each puzzle.

name: Jewel of Kuru
description: Experience the enchanted land of Kuru, filled with secrets and incredible multilevel bosses to fight on your way to find the Jewel Of Kuru which lies in the secrets on this majestic open world. Set in fantasy land of Kuru, its focuses on amazing boss fights with hack n' Slash gameplay.

name: Sword of Shushan
description: Sword of Shushan is a strategic war chess game based on the holy land of Shushan and the war between ancient demons. The player will play the role of Han Yunchuan, a disciple of Shushan, who will call on the friars of Wufeng and the elite of Taihao royal family to fight against the ancient demons.

name: Card Killer
description: This is a highest death rate game of survival, combined with masculinity, survival, thriller, suspense reasoning and other elements. There are two main lines you can choose from the story - the male line and the female line. Meanwhile, you can also choose different talents as you like.

name: Polycalypse: Last Bit of Hope
description: Survive the zombie apocalypse by yourself or with your friends in this low poly post apocalyptic world. Survive, build your base and fight the zombies. But beware, you aren't the only one trying to survive. There are other survivors in proceduraly generated bases that will shoot you on sight!

name: Mad Mosh
description: Next level heavy metal music sim - Stage dive, pogo, head bang to your hearts content. Or Load up some classical tunes and mosh to that, we don't mind.

name: Astronomia
description: Astronomia is a spatial 3D puzzle game with a minimalist classic arcade art style. Guide the ball around each level to clear every fragment block and unlock the goal. A fun brain-teaser for casual and hardcore puzzlers alike!

name: Sir War-A-Lot
description: A 2D action platformer where you explore and fight your way through various locations in your quest to kill the monsters who wronged you. Upgrade your skills and abilities along the way and take on the challenges that come your way as the bad tempered, sword throwing Sir-War-A-Lot.

name: Beast Nature
description: You have to fight your fears and solve a mystery of this area. We dont know what lives here aliens, ghosts, bigfoot or just some wild coyotes, when night comes something weird used to happen. Better find something more powerfull then your old shotgun...

name: Restoration Master
description: Restoration Master - become the master of restoration and discover your unknown skills! Unscrew, saw, weld, grind, remove rust, paint, and earn money!

name: The protectors of Deya
description: Embark on an adventure that will take you to discover the story of Silver and his friends, each with their own skills and characteristics. A turn-based strategic combat in pure RPG style.

name: Jungle Rumble
description: Jungle Rumble is a game about a brave soldier who tries to restore order in the deep wilds of the Amazon by destroying the army of the evil Skull!

name: Floral Town
description: Floral Town, the adorable Life Sim with a focus on interesting characters and relationships!

name: Canyon Shooter
description: A super classic aerial metal warhead mini game. As a special soldier in the game, you are ready to fight the enemy in the air. Let's act together!

name: Mountains and Rivers scroll
description: Shanhai Scroll is a 2D round card strategy game. Players will collect monsters in the plot and open a beautiful story about why monsters turn into monsters.

name: Conqueror's Blade: Season VI - Scourge of Winter
description:
The worst winter in living memory holds the North in an icy grip. Under cover of this freezing darkness, a horde of bandits, renegades, and exiles known as the Desecrators has conquered Ostaria. Under the command of the terrifying Scourge of Winter, a mysterious figure who plagued the land in legends, these brigands thrive on greed and unending cruelty.

As the Desecrators sow terror across the North, the survivors of their brutal assault flee south to Ungverija, seeking to join forces with any heroes who will take a stand against terror. Thanes and freemen, knights and kings must all join together in a desperate alliance to deliver Ostaria from the evil of the Scourge of Winter, and drive back the Desecrators by winter's end.

name: Let's Journey
description: Let's Journey - idle clicker rpg in amazing fantasy world. Choose your hero, roll dice and embark on an epic adventure! During the journey you will defeat hundreds of monsters, find rare equipment and meet legendary dragons.

name: Mayhem Space Cinema
description: Board into the “Mayhempalooza III” the interstellar Earthling research Spaceship, gather your Friends, share youtube, facebook or twitch videos and let the mayhem begins!

name: Choco Pixel 5
description: Choco Pixel 5 is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space and avoiding traps.

name: Catie in MeowmeowLand
description: Catie in MeowmeowLand is a classical humorous point-and-click adventure game. Help little Catie get back home from the bizarre cat world of MeowmeowLand!

name: Little Drift
description: Little drift is a racing game. The goal of the game is to score the most points. There are 4 levels available. In the presence of 9 cars with tuning.

name: Disc Golf Valley VR
description: Disc Golf Valley is home to some of the most beautiful and challenging disc golf courses in the world. Now you can experience them in spectacular VR! Fill up your disc bag, sign up for tournaments and challenge every course in the Valley.

name: Conqueror's Blade: Season VII - Wolves of Ragnarok
description: The war for the North is won and winter’s grip begins to thaw. However, amidst the din of blades in bloody battles, something sinister has taken residence in the forest east of Vajk’s Lake. Strange lights dance in the pines, lupine howls scar the midnight air, and a rising tally of souls have been lost to the shadows of the glade. Here, the demented worshippers of the wolf-god Fenrir have amassed an army and set upon the land with a fierce vengeance as they seek to enthrone their leader as king.

name: Left Dex
description: Left Dex A Game With Challenge, Adventure, Strategy, Indie, Parkour Rectangle, Large Difficulty, Single-Player Game, Sun and Realistic Shadow.

name: Conqueror's Blade: Season VIII - Dynasty
description: Rise above the storm clouds of ceaseless war, and breathe in the innovation and opportunity of a wondrous land. Follow the rise of a dynasty, of its heroes and warriors, through years of chaos and war to a time of order and prosperity. Behold this golden age in Season VIII: Dynasty, a new era of Conqueror’s Blade.

name: Tale of MoWu
description: "Tale of MoWu" is an MMORPG. The game provides players with a lot of different quality equipment, which can be obtained by challenging various BOSSs. the pursuit of obtaining high-level (or superb) equipment has become one of the main goals of players in the game.

name: Run Ralph Run
description: Ralph is a smart dinosaur, and a great shooter.

name: Domestic Defense
description: Home invasion horror game. Manually set up security cameras to try to locate and eliminate the threat from your household. Deal with distractions from others, and work to stop the intruder before it is too late. Not too serious. More of a fun, gameplay oriented experience.

name: Fallen Rebellion
description: Run and jump through the land of an ancient civilization in a challenging platformer in which your goal is to reach the end without any saves.

name: Hex Slayer
description: Hex Slayer is a turn-based strategy game where the goal is to conquer the island. Featuring special classes and custom campaigns, expand your kingdom and outwit the enemy by building huts, towers, and powerful units.

name: Robo Terror
description: Robo Terror is a dynamic and hardcore platformer, action shooter with a side view. There are 3 types of weapons in the hero's arsenal: a Blaster, a Gatling laser and a Beam gun, as well as grenades.

name: HexaLife
description: Hexalife is a survival / roguelike game based around a procedural hexagonal world. Complete dungeons & set up camp!

name: MachineryWorld
description: This game is a sci-fi action role-playing game From assembly to painting, you can greatly customize your character

name: Addle Earth
description: 2D-isometric game with a lot of action and sci-fi narrative. Play with and switch between three characters: Kit - the girl, Che - the ape and Moses - the alien, as they explode as many droids as possible!

name: Hero Allstars: Void Invasion
description: 용사 올스타즈: 공허의 습격(Hero Allstars: Void Invasion)은 캐주얼한 판타지 턴제 롤플레잉 게임입니다. 전 세계에 걸쳐 일어난 이상 현상을 조사하는 군대의 지휘관이 되어, 여러명의 동료들과 함께 진실을 파헤치며 다가오는 모든 적들을 쓰러뜨리세요.

name: Crazy Jump
description: "Crazy Jump" is a 2D jumping game. Players will play as spheres, go through various levels set by the Demon King, and finally save the world. In the game, the Demon King will challenge your reaction speed, control ability, and adaptability!

name: Captain Prosper
