description: Tactical, turn-based strategy RPG with romance, adult scenes and a plot of a smuggler with a hidden past.

name: Knight of the Parking Lot
description: Knight of The Parking Lot is a vibrant and magical round based brawler. Fight your way through the wild creations of an overactive imagination, wielding weapons the world offers up to you.

name: Bird Path
description: Bird path is a peaceful exploration game where you must overcome various obstacles and fly into check points in order to earn points and get into the leaders.

name: Swire Future
description: "Swire Future" is a high degree of freedom game from the era of ancient mythology to the future era. Players can choose any character in this world to play. The Age of Archaic Mythology includes 10 professions, random characters account for 6 professions.

name: Black Infinity
description: black infinity is a multi online FPS game. Take control of your favorite character and fight your way through the field until you're the last one standing!

name: Chesnakisnak
description: A first-person choose-your-own adventure set in an anachronistic city.

name: TenebriS
description: Tenebris is a hardcore platformer in which you play as a skull trying to get out of a dark dungeon

name: Dear Mom
description: A short narrative adventure about mom, which will leave you with unforgettable incredible emotions about your mom.

name: Eye of Ouroboros
description: Eye of Ouroboros is an action roguelike adventure game set in a mythical state between life and void. Master the heroes fighting styles and the unique perks acquired throughout the journey. The game can be played by 1-4 players.

name: Dawn of the Others
description: In this genre-bending zombie shooter, you will be faced with a challenging mission. To save the town of Ivannovsk. Fight off the zombies whilst completing quests, come across hidden objects, and explore the huge island of Neli Inew Lands, as a lone wolf, or with a team of survivors in multiplayer.

name: Blackstorm
description: Born as an university project, Blackstorm is an online multiplayer Battle Royale where players form crews of three pirates and face each other in deadly combat. Sail with your spaceship in a three-dimensional environment with total freedom of movement and rotation.

name: My Last Memories About You
description: My Last Memories About You is about a husband who is fulfilling the last wish of his late wife in this short first-person exploration game. The game is short, but in exchange delivers an emotional and heartwarming story, which stays with the player long after experiencing this adventure.

name: Monster Legend
description: ”Legend Monster“ is a 3D game with roguelike, self-propelled chess and strategy. You can upgrade various fantasy creatures and form different team lineups. These creatures have their own unique skills.

name: Farm Dungeons
description: This game was placed 5th in the ranking of Paid RPG and 11th in the ranking of All Paid Game in the Japan App Store! Farm simulation dungeon RPG "Farm Dungeons" is finally here! It's full of fun elements such as agriculture, craft, cooking, guild, pets, dairy farming, and home remodeling!

name: Aripi
description: "Aripi" is an exciting adventure about an astronaut forgotten in orbit and his dream that unexpectedly came true.

name: To Hell With the Ugly
description: An adventure game about a series of kidnappings, a murderous conspiracy... and being handsome.

name: Kawaii Memory
description: Repeat the light sequence to pass to the next level! - Come and train your memory in a relaxing way!

name: Karakia Shooter
description: Fast Paced, Bullet Hell Retro Shooter! Shoot down enemies and dodge everything. Fight through 17 intense levels with 6 insane boss fights. Do you have what it takes to beat the game?

name: Tomb of Pharaohs
description: Collect keys to unlock the "Pharaohs Tomb" and fight his remains to pass the level! Dodge traps, scorpions and mummies in a procedurally generated maze!

name: Noise Hunters
description: Noise Hunters is an action stealth video game where noise is your tool, but also your enemy. Don't let them hear you, HUNT or be HUNTED.

name: Jelly Is Sticky
description: Explore a world of colorful jelly blocks that can be deformed and stuck together. Use them in surprising, unexpected ways to build clever contraptions and solve delightful puzzles.

name: Puzzle Bowling
description: Puzzle Bowling - is a minimalistic puzzle game.Just figures and a task to be solved. Nothing extra.

name: Physics World
description: "Physics World" is a fast-paced horizontal version of the decryption game. There are various colorful physical formulas in the scene, which represent some physical rules. Players can create favorable situations by changing the common physical rules.

name: Sid Classic
description: Sid! Powerful souls were born here as beautiful women or boys. Then, they protect the Time and Space engine here. You can see a school fantasy that transcends time and space in a parallel world.

name: Midnight Bike
description: Race one of the fastest motorbikes at breakneck speed, down a busy highway in first-person! Weave your way through traffic as you climb the global leaderboard.

name: Slave Princess Sarah
description: Play as Sarah, the sexy warrior princess, as she fights to restore peace to her kingdom! Enjoy ultra-low res pixel animations, 8 bit chip tune sound, and a cutting edge hardcore story to tie them all together! Nostalgia and newness come together in this 8 Bit hand-held game style action RPG!

name: Mind-Blowing Girls
description: A puzzle game where you need to assemble a complete image from several pieces.

name: Wonderland Online
description: Wonderland Online is an MMO where players are tasked with surviving a shipwreck for an extended amount of time.

name: Iron Reckoning
description: Become a warrior in this sci-fi/fantasy adventure! Iron Reckoning showcases a unique movement mechanic that will test your skill in preserving airborne momentum. Wield a variety of powers and master the combat to defeat your enemies, as you uncover the mystery behind a deadly machine threat!

name: Thrust Legend
description: There are a lot of bad thrust clones out there... This is not one of them.

name: Shokuo Shoujo
description: Huntress Yuki and her brother Yuu depend on each other, living in a remote village.

name: Spacey Vade
description: Synth-wave styled physics based 2D puzzle shooter filled with nods to the golden era of classic arcade games. Think upside down Peggle crossed with Space Invaders and enemies crafted from the blended remains 70's, and 80’s gaming.

name: Helixian
description: Helixian is a top down space shooter akin to games like Galaga with intense boss fights and bullet hell like stages

name: 幻刃录
description: 《幻刃录》是一款西游题材的RPG仙侠游戏，不单拥有丰富的玩法、精美的场景、炫丽的打斗特效等特色，更有幻刃神兵特色养成系统；在游戏里你可将一块凡铁打造成为能与孙悟空金箍棒同阶的存在，幻刃神兵多种形态可满足玩家培养的欲望；游戏中更新悟空虎装，唐僧袈裟等特色时装让玩家本色出演；加入仙门学习仙法，丰富副本获得法宝，开局送神兵，通关送vip，元宝直接掉落，拥有VIP与神兵的你，可以创建家族，制霸全服；快来与孙悟空一起大闹天宫吧！

name: WW2 Rebuilder
description: In WWII Rebuilder you will make cities destroyed in the World War II come back to life. Use various heavy equipment to clear away debris and grab the bricks yourself to rebuild the walls of houses where people will live happily again.

name: Minestrife
description: A puzzle game of logic and probability. Identify mines and clear boards across eleven difficulties, the dreaded survival mode, and custom boards of sizes limited only by your computer's memory. Good luck, you'll need it.

name: Basement Dweller
description: Basement Dweller is a satirical and comedic first person game powered by daily routines and activities. Can you handle it?

name: Robo Oh
description: FC-style robots fighting game!

name: Anime Artist 3: Harem
description: Tired of working alone? This time 4 lovely girls are here to assist you in your journey to become the best Anime Artist! Draw, Color, Collect art while unlocking tons of dresses and hair styles! Fully personalize your helpers and, this time, don't forget to make them fall in love!

name: Don't Touch this Button!
description: Don't Touch this Button! is a minimalistic puzzle game with a first-person point of view.

name: Last Nuclear Darkness
description: Nuclear Reactor Simulator, operable by a single person with the help of an AI Assistant, stalked by Bel'Uk, the third demon that invaded our world, and all the dead who support him. You must survive and keep the reactor running to light up the city.

name: Psychoverse City
description: PSYCHOVERSE CITY, a dizzyingly fast-paced first-person platformer across the rooftops of an ever-evolving cityscape, accompanied by adrenaline-pumping beats!

name: Bullet Time
description: Bullet Time is the new shooting fun game. Mafia took your dog and you are coming for a big revenge! Use only one bullet and one shot to kill them all. Are you ready to test your shooting skills with one shot ONLY?

name: Happy Day
description: Happy Day – a first-person game, with a small town on Christmas being the scene. Here, all the people are nice and kind, and everyone goes to their neighbors’ place for a cup of tea every day.

name: Chinese mother in law
description: This is a story about betrothal gifts

name: Steep Slopes
description: Steep Slopes is a snowboarding endless runner game!

name: Rainy Day Roommate
description: Two roommates spend a rainy day relaxing, but need your help for their hearts to beat together! This is a casual rhythm game with a focus on chill, and eye candy. Keep on beat and score hearts to grow these two beauties closer together! 3 levels with steamy bonuses for high scores.

name: Bouncy Cat
description: Bounce across platforms to obtain fish

name: Guns Boy
description: "Guns Boy" is a fast-paced 2D platformer shooter with a goal to survive a battle against armed opponents.

name: Mane
description: Wild lion Narrative sim RPG focused on choices and consequences portraying the violent lion social structure in its ruthless unbending laws of nature. Telling its timeless tale in an exaggerating visual and romanticized lore as a kingdom medieval glory.

name: Song of the Tides
description: Embark on a journey with no return to explore, fight and loot your way through the Shifting Isles- by yourself or with your friends. With the winds as your guide, you might just discover your destiny.

name: Trappuzzler
description: trappuzzler is a puzzle game about feeling trapped and moving people.

name: Planetary Gravity
description: Planetary Gravity is a high-score chasing casual action game based upon staying alive while being bombarded with meteors and asteroids. Use the arrow keys or WASD Keys to avoid explosions and keep your lives for as long as possible.

name: Sword and Spirit
description: Play as an adventurer who is trying to escape an ancient labyrinth with a magical sword! Fight enemies, power up your sword, and talk to spirits to successfully make it out of the labyrinth!

name: Kooring VR Coding Adventure
description: Let’s ride the Blockstar and go on a journey to the Coding World. Help Kooring catch the troubled Tooring in the beautiful Block World! Having fun playing block coding fosters logical thinking and creativity. The Highest Level of Immersion Brings The Highest Learning Effect!

name: Pumpkin Farmer
description: The genre? 2D. The theme? Feel good. mechanics? You look for the pumpkin. Appeal? It should brighten up your day.

name: Shadows Behind the Throne 2
description: An apocalyptic grand strategy game, in which you take the role of the forces of darkness, trying to bring an end to a fantasy world. Complete with complex internal politics by NPC factions and wide ranges of strategies and types of doom to choose between.

name: The Legend of Bear: Truck Trucker
description: The physics bear driving stacking hauling trading game

name: Golden Moon
description: Golden Moon is an old school, 3D Third-Person puzzle platformer game about finding treasure and working your way past ancient robots, booby-traps, and other menaces.

name: Takorita Meets Fries
description: Deep under the sea, there is a princess who didn't know anything about french fries. This is her story, Princess Takorita's fated encounter with the french fries.

name: Pathfinder Puzzle
description: Find the right path to collect all stars and bring you car save to the target zone.

name: Somnium Shore
description: A challenging, 2D Platform Adventure game where all level mechanics can change if you don't stay balanced. Help Ethan to grow up and leave his roots in order to pursue his dreams, find clues about his past and fight against your nightmares in your journey to the Somnium Shore!

name: Untamed Tactics
description: Untamed Tactics is a unique tactical RPG that blends immersive storytelling with rogue-lite elements. Relive the ever-changing life story of rabbit General Greycoat, and face the haunted dreams of his wartime past as you explore Greycoat’s nightmares come to life.

name: Keep looking
description: Introduction: This is a game that can bring you more fun when you are bored and unhappy.

name: Poetry, wine and sword
description: 挂机爬塔副本，懒人休闲游戏，诗词题材，词条策略搭配，重铸强化，体验慢慢变强的感觉，已更新门派，侠客，经脉，种植，厨师玩法，新装备玩法更简单休闲，可穿满8件相同装备。欢迎加群一起设计600733136

name: Grit Paintball
description: Grit Paintball is a Virtual Reality tournament paintball trainer and simulator. Aimed mostly at current paintball players looking to gain an edge in the real game, Grit allows players to practice from home.

name: Violent Witches: the Vindicator
description: Sorrowful Witch Killing RPG

name: Click on their Heads
description: Do you like a cheap chuckle? The objective of the game is fairly straight forward - trolls will spawn in increasing numbers and rush towards you. Your job is to click on their heads. If you do that, you progress. If you don't, you lose the game when they touch you.

name: The Lodge
description: A first-person, psychological horror game, The Lodge takes players on a journey into the horrors of a twisted mind.

name: Bride for the Princess
description: Bride for the Princess is Erotic Yuri Visual Novel that tells a story about a Princess who must find someone to marry before her upcoming coronation due to a conspiracy; a legislation that was passed behind her back in attempt to ruin her.

name: Dim Glow
description: Dim Glow is a casual game where you control a dark sphere and you need to shoot at enemies, for each hit you get a point. You also have a limited number of bullets, and 4 lives that are taken away if you are hit. And how many times will you be able to hit enemies?

name: Cyberwinter
description: Cyberwinter is an isometric action strategy game. On a distant planet with a harsh climate, you have to fight legions of dangerous monsters for a new home for humanity. Build bases, develop and defend them.

name: No Cure 2
description: The zombies are hiding in plain sight and your job is still to find and kill them.

name: Giants
description: The adventure story of the most attractive heroes begins. Heroes prepare for their revenge to fight against Giants, the owners of the Nable continent. Go on a fantastic and cool adventure with them.

name: Rytmos
description: A relaxing puzzle game where you create music by solving mazes.

name: Number One Rich
description: Number One Rich is an 8-player strategy game.Decide the number of steps you take by throwing dice. You can buy land and build buildings where you stay, and you must pay rent when passing other players' land. Bankrupt other players to get the first place.

name: Shadownest
description: Asymmetric multiplayer meets atmospheric horror

name: Cosmoscope
description: Cosmoscope is a top down twin stick shooter with a twist. The game combines the frantic action of classic space shooters with unique kaleidoscope inspired gameplay. Tasked with defending Humanity against a mysterious alien race, you will need to use both firepower and your quick wits to survive.

name: Platzkart Simulator
description: Travel in a soviet platzkart train through Syberia

name: Gothic 1881
description: Autumn 1881 - deep in the Thuringian forests lies the village of Rabenfels. From here a new epidemic spread over the whole country. You are a young doctor sent by the Imperial Office of Disease to investigate the origin of this mysterious disease.

name: 逃离地球
description: This is a board game. Your goal is to defeat your rivals and win the battery. Then you can get on the UFO.

name: Akyrikon VR
description: Everyone familiar with RPGs know that to get better, your hero sometimes need to grind and train. But this time, it will be you. Train in VR to make your hero stronger and maybe you will be able to become a true defender of Akyrikon.

name: Dasher
description: A game about a mysterious robotic coliseum. Use your dashing abilities to dismantle your enemies, and survive until you find a way to escape this mechanical cemetery.

name: Divided Kingdoms
description: Divided Kingdoms is a multilayered medieval real time and turn based strategy with elements of role playing in the mix. You will have to unite your once mighty Kingdom and restore its former glory by overcoming challenges using strategy and skill.

name: DeadOS
description: DeadOS is an early access zombie outbreak simulator by Benn Powell that focuses on city-wide scenarios where you have access to fully customize your apocalypse experience from beginning to end. Simulation. Sandbox. Survival!

name: Butt Naked & Big Guns
description: Big Guns just got fired and had all her money stolen from her account. She now has to work for a slave driver of a boss, the psychopathic Butt Naked. She must kill monsters and pests or end up on skid row.

name: Immortal Hero
description: This is 3D RPG Game. You can level up by defeating monsters, or grow through specific equipment and skills. And you can also see hidden stories through interactive elements found in the middle of the game. Defeat the Demon King and become a world-saving hero.

name: Hibow
description: Hibow is a simulation of the future of multiplayer combat VR game. In the arena of the future world all players as a variety of superheroes compete and fight with players all around the world.

name: Neon Struct: Carrion Carrier
description: Do jobs to earn money to recharge to do jobs. An FPS speedrunning game developed for the A Game By Its Cover 2020 game jam.

name: Huge Breast Princess Knight Anne
description: Huge breasts are nothing but a bother for a knight... this is an RPG about a huge breasted princess-knight who struggles for the sake of her country and her family.

name: After Crisis: Snowstorm
description: A game with survival and decryption elements in a frozen world.

name: Rawshire the Last Hatchling
description: Play an action adventure collectathon where an evil dragon has destroyed the last dragon sanctuary of Rawshire. Level up, unlock new abilities (unlimited flight), take on gigantic mythical bosses, solve unique puzzles and uncover the truth about who you are. Every choice matters.

name: Batterneers
description: Batterneers is a multiplayer, pirate ship fighting game! Compete in the arena with your friends, using a range of unique cannons, powerups, bombs and effects.

name: Herbis
description: Herbis - is an easy-to-learn game that requires concentration, speed, and reaction. Find patterns, collect combos, get points and go to new levels! But remember, your time allotted to complete each level is limited!

name: Space Revenge
description: Space Revenge is an action-exploration game. With a top down perspective, twin stick controls and a sci-fi mood to explore the enemy base full of dangers. Embark in this adventure and hunt down the responsible of your fathers dead. The only way is REVENGE!

name: Clockwork Pussy
description: A young mechanic girl ( and nymphomaniac former hooker ) inherits from her sexual client a huge vehicle repair shed. However, this workshop is in the middle of a neighborhood dominated by a gang of criminal freaks.

name: Christmas Rhythm
description: This is a Chiptune Rhythm game for Christmas aficionados everywhere! Six merry songs with two difficulty settings

name: Love on Paper
description: People come and go. Some stay for a while. Everyone has their dreams.

name: Cubic Juice
description: This is a game requiring both logic and strategy where the goal is to build solid layers of cubes without empty spaces using given figures with some certain shape. A player gets score with each built layer and this layer of cubes is removed from the matrix.

name: My Silly Life
description: A linear visual novel about the experiences and thoughts of a young boy seeking for his place to live. Animated backgrounds and character sprites will help you fully immerse yourself in the game's history. Feel the experience of the main character, will you agree with him?

name: A Dark Ice Saga: The Rescue
description: A simplistic-platformer created by 13 & 7 year-old kids and their parents.

name: Bule Form
description: 《蓝色形态(Bule Form)》是一款BL向角色扮演。以都市为主要活动地点，在都市与战区之间辗转。在战斗中打败你的敌人，破解谜题推进事件发展。

name: Seeking Revenge
description: Hardcore 3d Top Down Shooter inspired by Hotline miami. In the game you have to go through bright levels with nice graphics. Choosing different weapons, destroy enemies while listening to stylish music. At the end of the levels, see short hand-drawn inserts that move the plot.

name: MahjongSchool
description: "MahjongSchool" is a beautiful girl + eliminate mahjong leisure game. Players should find out three same mahjong cards in the game and eliminate them, but it should be noted that they will occupy the grid before finding them together!

name: Gun Party
description: "Gun party" is a cooperative hard core double rocker Top Down shooting game. Where there are many zombies, play the survivor of zombie virus, fight side by side with other players, and take part in the intense self-defense counterattack to defeat the enemy

name: Chaos Road
description: Chaos Road is an action-packed 3D shmup race shooter where you can drive different cars and rid the city of crime with an arsenal of weapons. Take the fast lane on traffic, attack and smash cars rivals on the road to revenge the city!

name: Dramaqueen
description: DRAMAQUEEN lets players tell their own stories, and share them with their friends, for fun, for learning or for both.

name: Dooria
description: An intricate hardcore puzzle game within a world that feels both familiar and foreign, allowing you to lust for the solution or meander without aim for a journey entirely your own.

name: HandsON
description: HandsON is a unique experience in virtual reality that you don't want to miss out on! Let this magical world of hands and dance amaze you and immerse yourself in an interactive surreal world you have never seen before.

name: Wizard Bros
description: Have fun with up to Four of your Wizard Bros in this action packed Couch Co-Op Party Brawler with Ragdoll Physics.

name: Nullptr
description: An action puzzle game where you play the role of a hacker. Take down megacorporations by invading their servers, downloading their data, and getting out without being detected. Outwit defensive sentinel programs and expose the perfect route to access the databases.

name: Live the Life
description: Live the Life is the first person life simulation game focused on the deep player's interaction with the environment. Design your apartment using advanced building features, visit stores to buy furniture, food and clothing you like, and more completely free content coming soon

name: 混沌西游
description: Sin descripción

name: Punch the Potus
description: Punch the Potus every time he says something stupid!

name: Электричка
description: Короткая кинетическая новелла, рассказывающая о поездке Максима на утренней заснеженной электричке.

name: Highrise Mogul
description: Highrise Mogul: design, build and manage your own skyscraper. Make floor plans, place rentable rooms, hire staff, design a beautiful garden, manage your own power grid and much more!

name: Cosmodome
description: Cosmodome: a wrestling inspired, intergalactic, arena-based, ship combat game where the audience decides who wins or loses. Fight with 4 different characters each wielding their own unique ships and weapons.

name: Forester Simulator
description: Take care of a forest, chill out in nature, and protect it from people that just don’t care! Cut trees using big machines or chase wood thieves on quads. Be kind to animals, make friends with them, and see for yourself what the forest hides.

name: Woodland Empire
description: Woodland Empire is an anti-citybuilder; a natural take on the typical city building game. Instead of building roads and power lines, you'll control the wind, rain and sunlight to help your forest grow. Employ the help of woodland creatures to manage, upgrade and grow your empire.

name: The Last Hope
description: The Last Hope is a Metroidvania-style platform game with RPG elements, in which the player controls an unnamed character who is transported against his will to the underworld, and now has to discover how to escape and how to survive the dangers around him.

name: I Wish Michael Phantomino Were Here
description: You are Michael Phantomino, a little ghost who shows up wherever someone needs help solving pentamino puzzles.

name: Long Distance
description: Gather a friend, a family member or your SO and dive into this cooperative puzzle platformer!

name: Ling Chong Xiu Xian
description: Sin descripción

name: Nex:Os Colosseum
description: NEX:OS is a community driven Ability/Movement focused Looter-Shooter style FPS game set in a war torn future. You play as a Centurion, a Biologically and Cybernetically enhanced near-immortal super soldier.

name: Sacred Cubes
description: A logic game with many exciting levels of varying difficulty.

name: Knights of Braveland
description: Hack and slash villains with your friends. An infinitely replayable series of quests - unlock new events, heroes, equipment and defeat bosses in the end of each unique run.

name: Arc Wizards
description: The war of the wizards begins! This is a shooting action game!

name: In the dark forest
description: "In the dark forest" is a 2d side-scroller defense game. Improve your skills and upgrade weapons, protect your home from waves of undead!

name: Ertugrul Gazi
description: Ertugrul Gazi 3D RPG Game

name: Minimalist Space War
description: A minimalist retro space shooter. Challenging, fast, and fun game play

name: Apollon 88
description: Apollon 88 is a 2D Top-Down, survival, shooter game. You play as 88, where your goals are to survive by destroying the one who hunts you.

name: Rig Score
description: Photorealistic graphics have arrived. Render the graphics of the future... today. Build your own cinematics, simulate car photography, benchmark your PC and compare it to others on the Leaderboard. Toggle ray tracing in real-time.

name: Ultra Break
description: Ultra Break is a modern take on the classic brick-breaker genre which merges classic, fast-paced gameplay with new mechanics and tight controls.

name: Nightmare Survival
description: A nightmare with a toy Kalashnikov assault rifle. Survive killing monsters, which are increasing every minute.

name: Roll Control
description: Inspired by games like Super Monkey Ball and Marble Madness, Roll Control is a 3D balance based platformer, built to be played with your body. Using the Roll Controller App on your mobile device, players can transform their balance board into a human game controller.

name: TAL: Arctic 4
description: This is a game in which you have to help an unknown creature to go to a magical portal through many mazes.

name: Happy Summer Holiday
description: This is a survival game where you play the role of Xiao Yuan, the protagonist of the game, who is stranded on a deserted island after a boat accident. In this story, you need to use the props available on the island to survive until the next day and win.

name: Powerboat VR
description: Powerboat VR is an advanced power boat simulator designed specifically for VR but also supports Non-VR modes. Take part in challenging races against AI opponents or simply relax and enjoy exploring the scenery!

name: Tiny Troopers: Global Ops
description: Attention! Tiny Troopers: Global Ops is a fast-paced arcade twin-stick shooter in which you lead an elite squad of Tiny Troopers on action-packed missions to take down hordes of unscrupulous enemies from all corners of the world!

name: Outer Space Shack
description: Build a space base on the Moon or Mars with current technology, from the 1970s to the space race starting now. Optimize every pound of payload of your rockets, exploit local resources and ensure the welfare of your courageous astronauts.

name: Motherboard
description: Motherboard is an action-adventure game, settled inside the computer! Take on the role of the Bit - one of the inhabitants of the motherboard and help him to save the world from viruses!

name: Bug Blast
description: Fight and dodge through hundreds of space bugs in Bug Blast! Go through each space station to protect from the hoards of bugs that come their way.

name: Heavy is the Hand that Holds the Six-Shooter
description: A mouse controlled isometric adventure in the Wild West with real time combat and some light survival and CRPG elements. Let him who is without sin cast the first stone. Heavy is the hand that holds the six-shooter.

name: Voenkomat
description: VOENKOMAT is a social game. This game makes it possible to become a worst enemy of russian teens and guys - military comissar. You need to send to the army as many as possible soldiers, protect yours military HQ from foreign spies and save your soul from karmic devastation.

name: Chronicles of Elmyra
description: The young wizardess Faira has been commissioned to investigate strange deadly nightmares. Start this new adventure exploring the world of Elmyra. Will she be able to complete her mission?

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Marseille
description: This incredible scenery has over 60,000 custom building objects, to provide a one of a kind flying experience. The flight path into LFML takes you right over the harbor areas with a great view of the expansive city.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - US Cities X: Indianapolis
description: US Cities X: Indianapolis from Aerosoft covers the Indianapolis area in FSX:SE with extensive satellite coverage and includes all major buildings and thousands of accurately placed autogen buildings. There are nine detailed heliports, complete with sound effects, and the famous Indianapolis Speedway is also modeled.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - US Cities: Detroit
description: Detroit is home to the busiest airport in the state of Michigan. Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport (KDTW) is the second largest Delta Airlines hub in terms of daily flights. Detroit Metro and the many other smaller airports make this a complex and busy environment for pilots.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - C-17 Globemaster III
description: The C-17 Globemaster III is a high-wing, 4-engine, T-tailed military-transport aircraft used by the US Air Force and its allies. The multi-service C-17 can carry large equipment, supplies and troops directly to small airfields in harsh terrain anywhere in the world day or night.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Boeing B-29 Superfortress
description: Produced under license. Boeing and B-29 Superfortress, their distinctive logos, product markings and trade dress are trademarks of The Boeing Company.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Pilatus PC-9/A
description: Developed by IRIS from the Royal Australian Air Force’s PC-9/A pilot manual, the Pilatus PC-9/A for FSX: Steam Edition offers a wealth of realistic detail along with accurate flight dynamics and systems operation.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Florence
description: Florence, capital of Italy's Tuscany region and birthplace of the Renaissance, is home to masterpieces of art and architecture. One of its most iconic sites is the Florence Cathedral, with its terra-cotta-tiled dome engineered by Brunelleschi and bell tower designed by Giotto.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Vought F4U Corsair
description: Probably the most recognised US Navy aircraft of WWII, due to its distinctive folding cranked-wing design, this Vought F4U Corsair has been built over the most accurate plans available, including original factory plans and drawings.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Battle of Britain Hurricane
description: A famous name from the 1940s comes to FSX: Steam Edition! The Hawker Hurricane lost out somewhat in the fame stakes to the much more renowned Spitfire, but the reality is that Hurricanes proved more effective than Spitfires in the Battle of Britain.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim Central Asia
description: Toposim Central Asia for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 11/19m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for Central Asia, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - US Cities X: New Orleans
description: This US Cities X scenery from Aerosoft covers New Orleans, with more than 1,200 major buildings modelled and around 30,000 realistically placed autogen buildings.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Douglas B-66 Destroyer
description: Based on the U.S. Navy's Douglas A3D Skywarrior, the B-66 Destroyer was SAC's light bomber, and was to replace the piston-powered B-26 Invader.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Night Environment: Alps
description: Night Environment completely revolutionizes night flying in the FSX: Steam Edition world. Using a series of databases, Night Environment adds brilliant, realistic lighting to your simulator.
